contest-event.event-date:
June 4, 1906 D Llandovery Contest
Llandovery Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Llandovery Contest llandovery-contest
Dinorah [arr. Godfrey]
Llandovery, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK 1st prize £12 and 2nd prize £6 divided between Ystalyfera and CwmTawe. 4 bands competed.
March 2, 2012, 2:58 p.m. Sept. 13, 2018, 5:09 p.m.
1 Ystalyfera Public Charles Anthony Morgan
1 Morgan's Cwmtawe Ystalyfera Evan John Evans
3 Protheroe's Silver Thomas Proctor
4 Ystradgynlais Public Band Unknown
